description:
Officer graphics available for "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening". A collection of 20 officer graphics through out the 40-year history of the series.

- Additional Officer Graphics
Collection of 20 officer graphics from the 40-year history of the "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION" series, including Nobunaga Oda from Zenkokuban, and Shingen Takeda from Sphere of Influence.

- How to Use Additional Graphics
Select "Custom Officers" or "Historical Officer" under the "Edit Officer" command, and set the added graphics.
The "Add" tab is located under the "Face" command inside both "Create New" and "Edit" for ‚ÄùCustom Officers", and inside "Edit" command for "Historical Officer".
name: "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening" 40th Anniversary "Series Collection of Officer Face Graphics" (set of 20)
